resources.string:
Ah! An uncontrollable exception occurred in the app. The detailed log is shown below, 
which can be copied and fed back to the developer. 
We will try our best to repair the exception. Thank you for your cooperation. 
Every feedback will make the app better!
An exception from an unknown source has been detected and the log cannot be captured normally. \n you can dictate the crash replication process to the developer \ n
